[ I or T ] to form syllables, by dividing words or by combining sounds or letters: In the second task, children were asked to syllabify each word. One way to help these spellers is to syllabify; another is to draw attention to prefixes and suffixes.
[ I ] to separate or combine to become a syllable or part of a syllable: They argue that not all cluster types syllabify in the same way.
